column4: Anyone else having problems with logging into reddit in Ubuntu?
or specifically with Firefox?
No, what problems are you experiencing?
It keeps loading (I can see the loading circle, it doesn't stops). Same issue with cic.gc.ca (when I access a https link)
similarly when I open facebook I'm directed to the security page which is also a https, and keeps loading forever
Can you access any https page?
Yes, Gmail works fine though.
Sounds like a problem with your browser's HTTPS
I'm using Firefox (the version which comes with Ubuntu 11.10)
How do I go about troubleshooting it?
Googling for something "Firefox HTTPS ubuntu problem" might help.
Nope. Couldn't get any good results. Though after like 5 minutes I'm logged in.
I shall check the other websites too.
It seems that your HTTPS is working fine but is _really_ slow then.
Seems like. I should try another browser.
Why it would be really slow I'm having a hard time finding out though, but check the rest of the sites.
Is there Opera for Ubuntu?
That might be a good idea.
Yes, absolutely.
There's also Chromium
Ubuntu Software Center cannot find any Opera, strange.
It's not there by default since it's not free software.
http://www.opera.com/browser/download/
Ah, I see. Thanks.
